name: Blood to Bone
storyline:
When the palace is attacked, you escape- but your twin is missing. You vow to find her at all costs, but will this lead you to a truth that you can't deny?

Throughout the story, you have to make decisions that will determine whether you'll come out of this alive- or not.
summary:
An adventure interactive text based story game of royalty and romance!
You can romance up to 4 characters while the story progresses.
